#summary document the controversy - Just started

= Introduction =

The is_about relation, sometimes referred to as the 'relation of aboutness' has generated a lot of controversy. This page will server, over time, to collect the discussions about the relation, it's (il)legitimacy, attempts at definition that would rescue it from being a primitive.

= Posts =

See Jonathan Rees's [http://odontomachus.wordpress.com/2014/03/30/aboutness-objects-propositions/  blog post] discussing an alternative to the current relation as a relation between a proposition (rather than an information content entity) and an object.
